definition: Liu Yang (1978-), China's first female astronaut in space (June 16, 2012)

sentences.english: Does Daphne 's father have the same work with Liu Yang's mother?
sentences.chinese: 达芙妮的父亲和刘洋的母亲从事相同的工作吗？

sentences.english: Major Liu and Captain Wang both have one child each.
sentences.chinese: 少校刘洋和上尉王亚平分别都有一个孩子。

definition: Li Peng (1928-), leading PRC politician, prime minister 1987-1998, reportedly leader of the conservative faction advocating the June 1989 Tiananmen clampdown

Wang Dan (1969-), Chinese dissident, one of the leaders of the Beijing student democracy movement of 1989
Hu Jia (1973-), PRC dissident human rights activist
